parameters.name: P0
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); location of dimension point

parameters.name: P1
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); nearest point on circle

parameters.name: P2
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); farthest point on circle diametrically opposite to P1

parameters.name: P3
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); plane normal

parameters.name: TextPoint
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); position of text

title: IDrawingDoc.ICreateDiamDim4
signature:
DisplayDimension ICreateDiamDim4( 
   ref System.Double
P0
,
   ref System.Double
P1
,
   ref System.Double
P2
,
   ref System.Double
P3
,
   ref System.Double
TextPoint
,
   System.Double
Val
,
   System.Double
TextHeight
)

parameters.name: P0
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); location of dimension point

parameters.name: P1
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); nearest point on circle

parameters.name: P2
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); farthest point on circle diametrically opposite to P1

parameters.name: P3
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); plane normal

parameters.name: TextPoint
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); position of text

remarks: SOLIDWORKS creates this type of dimension between the two points you specify. It has no relation to your geometry.
